H0.text: Plaka is the old quarter of which European city. Rome

H1.text: Plaka is the old quarter of which European city. Barcelona

H2.text: Plaka is the old quarter of which European city. Prague

H3.text: Plaka is the old quarter of which European city. Атина

A4.text: Pláka (Greek: Πλάκα) is the old historical neighborhood of Athens, clustered around the northern and eastern slopes of the Acropolis, and incorporating labyrinthine streets and neoclassical architecture.

A5.text: Plaka is the oldest district of Athens and has been continuously inhabited from the Neolithic to the present day.
